A poor farmer who stumbled upon the tree and discovered the precious gems hidden within its branches.
The farmer's greed and desire to become rich, leading him to cut down the tree and sell its valuable produce.
The enraged spirits of the jungle, seeking revenge on the farmer for destroying their home and sacred tree.
The farmer's sudden and mysterious disappearance, leaving behind only a trail of unsolved mysteries and rumors of a curse.
A group of treasure hunters, drawn to the story of the diamond-producing tree, venturing into the jungle to uncover the truth and claim the treasure for themselves.
